mapper.select: SELECT c.id, c.user1, c.user2, cl.content AS last_msg, cl.create_date AS last_send FROM chat c JOIN chatlog cl ON c.id = cl.chat_id LEFT JOIN chatlog cl2 ON c.id = cl2.chat_id AND cl.create_date < cl2.create_date WHERE (c.user1 = '1111' OR c.user2 = '1111') AND cl2.create_date IS NULL;
